Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shifting Scroll
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Arcane Artificer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Barkskin
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Candleshot
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dark Pact
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #8 Health to your hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dire Mole
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Feral Gibberer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gravelsnout Knight
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kingsbane
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Librarian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Psionic Probe
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unstable Evolution
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Echo Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: They grow up so fast.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wax Elemental
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Bladed Gauntlet
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cheat Death
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Reported.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crushing Hand
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Drygulch Jailor
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Drywhisker Armorer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Evasion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Hermit
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Murmuring Elemental
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers_twice.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Déjà Dude.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Plated Beetle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Potion of Heroism
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion Divine_Shield. Draw a card.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Raven Familiar
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Scorp-o-matic
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sudden Betrayal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Vulgar Homunculus
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wandering Monster
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Benevolent Djinn
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Boisterous Bard
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cave Hydra
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
this attacks.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragon Soul
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragonslayer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Explosive Runes
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fungal Enchanter
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gilded Gargoyle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greedy Sprite
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Healing Rain
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Apprentice
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all_enemies.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Barbarian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lone Champion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Primal Talismans
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Reckless Flurry
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rummaging Kobold
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sewer Crawler
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3_Giant Rat.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shrieking Shroom
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
1-Cost minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Divine Shield Poisonous
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Toothy Chest
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twilight Acolyte
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twilight's Call
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Elixir
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Maul
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Void Ripper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all_other_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Zola the Gorgon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 23 Kobolds and Catacombs Legendary cards.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Astral Tiger
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this minion into_your_deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Branching Paths
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a card; Give your minions +1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –
I took the one less traveled by,
And got eaten by a slime.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Call to Arms
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that cost (2) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cursed Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Duskbreaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Elven Minstrel
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fal'dorei Strider
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Flanking Strike
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hoarding Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hooked Reaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ironwood Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Monk
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: There is no candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Leyline Manipulator
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Oaken Summons
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 6 Armor. Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shimmering Courser
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Only you can target
this with spells and
Hero Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shroom Brewer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Restore #4_Health.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sneaky Devil
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Stealth Your other minions have +1 Attack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Darkness
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twig of the World Tree
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Arcane Tyrant
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Carnivorous Cube
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cataclysm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy all minions. Discard 2 cards.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corrosive Sludge
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Deck of Wonders
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragon's Fury
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fungalmancer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Green Jelly
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Guild Recruiter
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The original telemarketer.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Illusionist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. @(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Level Up!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
Ding!

Grats.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Skull of the Man'ari
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Trogg Gloomeater
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Poisonous
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Windshear Stormcaller
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Aluneth
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crystal Lion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gather Your Party
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gemstudded Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hungry Ettin
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Possessed Lackey
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rin, the First Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Seeping Oozeling
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Spiteful Summoner
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: To My Side!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
[x]Summon an Animal
Companion, or 2 if your
deck has no minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Val'anyr
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corridor Creeper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crushing Walls
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Psychic Scream
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rhok'delar
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Silver Vanguard
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit an 8-Cost minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Temporus
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Geosculptor Yip
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grand Archivist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grizzled Guardian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: King Togwaggle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Marin the Fox
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGet: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGetGold: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Runespear
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Violet Wurm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Woecleaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragonhatcher
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Master Oakheart
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sleepy Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Voidlord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 1/3 Demons with Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.
